named-native-query.name: PostModel.findAllPostFilters
named-native-query.query: SELECT p.id, p.subject, p.description, p.created_at as createdAt, p.updated_at as updatedAt, u.name as creator FROM Posts as p JOIN Users as u ON p.user_id = u.id WHERE CASE WHEN :search IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE p.subject LIKE CONCAT('%', :search, '%') OR p.description LIKE CONCAT('%', :search, '%') END AND CASE WHEN :fromDate IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE p.created_at >= :fromDate END AND CASE WHEN :toDate IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE p.created_at <= :toDate END AND CASE WHEN :creatorId IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE p.user_id = :creatorId END

named-native-query.name: PostModel.findPostDetails
named-native-query.query: SELECT p.id, p.subject, p.description, u.name as creator, CASE WHEN postLikes.likes IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE likes END AS likes FROM Posts as p LEFT JOIN Post_Likes as postLikes ON p.id = postLikes.post_id LEFT JOIN Users as u ON p.user_id = u.id WHERE p.id = :postId

named-native-query.name: CommentModel.findCommentsByPostId
named-native-query.query: SELECT c.id, c.created_at as createdAt, c.message, c.parent_id as parentId, u.name as creator FROM Comments as c JOIN Posts as p ON c.post_id = p.id AND c.post_id = :postId JOIN Users as u ON c.user_id = u.id

named-native-query.name: PostFileModel.findFileDetailByPostId
named-native-query.query: SELECT pFiles.id as fileId, CONCAT(:path, pFiles.id) as fileLink FROM Post_Files as pFiles JOIN Files as fi ON pFiles.file_id = fi.id WHERE pFiles.post_id = :postId

named-native-query.name: LikeModel.findLikeByUserIdAndPostId
named-native-query.query: SELECT COUNT(llikes.id) as likeCount FROM Likes as llikes WHERE llikes.user_id = :userId AND llikes.post_id = :postId AND llikes.is_like = true
